modName: Igloo Islands _ A Snowy Skaal Theme with Craft
summary: Two small, Skaal inspired arctic islands in new worldspaces.  Has 6 igloos and a fur trading post.  Craft fur (bandit) and Skaal armor as clothes, light, and heavy armor.  Dragonborn required.
descriptionHtml:
Igloo Islands - Beta
Winter theme, Skaal inspired islands with igloos and crafting.


Requirements:
Base Game + Update
Hearthfire
Dragonborn


Imagine two small islands in the Sea of Ghosts near Solstheim.  Here, families wrap themselves in heavy fur to protect against the bracing arctic cold.  The people hunt horkers, fish, and domesticate reindeer.  There is little wood and metal, and so homes are made of snow.


[b][u][color=#00ffff]To Travel Here:[/color][/u][/b]
Go to the small dock at Hlaalu Farm east of Windhelm.  I've added a fast travel marker on the map (see picture).
Click a boat to teleport to the desired island.

[u][b][color=#00ffff]The Islands:[/color][/b][/u]
Peaceful Igloo Island:
A quiet island in a vast empty sea.  The island has a large igloo with a frost magic theme, some ancient trees, and a domestic reindeer.

Hunter Igloo Island:
A small settlement of 4 igloos, a fur trading post, 3 NPCs, domestic reindeer, a dock with portal boat, some wildlife.

[u][b][color=#00ffff]Crafting:[/color][/b][/u]
Craft Armor at any Tanning Rack.
Fur Armor: clothing, light, heavy.  Sleeveless and circlet visible options available.
Skaal Armor: clothing, light, heavy.  Circlet enabled on cloth version only (invisible under hat anyways).
Note 1: Each item has proper keywords and should count for the 4-piece Matching Set Perk bonuses.Note 2: Tweak armor values to what you want. These items are separate from original Skaal and Fur clothing.  
Note 3: Armor and weapons use the mesh/textures in your game (except the shield?).Craft the bow, arrow, and at any blacksmith furniture.


[u][b][color=#00ffff]Cooking:[/color][/b][/u]
Two additional food recipes are included.
Horker Stew Special
Fish Stew Special


[u][b][color=#00ffff]NPC:[/color][/b][/u]
3 NPC followers are basic silent and stealthy.  They should not trigger simple traps.
Sami the Fur Trader, male, merchant/follower/marriageable 
Nanook, male, follower/marriageable 
Nyla, female, follower/marriageable 


[u][b]FAQs:[/b][/u]
1.  I see something already done in a different mod....
A.  This mod began over a year ago, so you may find features similar in newer mods.

2.  Why release it now?  
A. I thought someone else might enjoy the igloos.  Maybe one day I will finish a big island that I like, but until then enjoy the igloos.

3.  Why are there different islands?
A.  The mod has gone through many revisions.  I keep bulldozing the main islands.  Plus, I wanted an island with some snow-covered trees.

4.  You need more wildlife for an immersive village!
A.  Sorry.  See above.  I tried to learn how to build an LOD but failed, so I deleted my first island (yes, I know about Dyndolod).  Then I bulldozed my second island.  Then a third.  After hand navmeshing all the islands that I ended up deleting, I took a break.  So I created these simple islands to enjoy the igloos.


Possible continued development:
-Improve domestic reindeer
-Expanded islands with creatures
I'm undecided if I will publish any tweaks beyond bug fixes.  Depends on feedback.

Assets:
Many thanks to: berticus, blary, elianora, flintone, ghosu, insanitysorrow, jokerine, lolicept, oaristys, and tamira.
See the permissions tab for details.


Now for a little fun!
